/api/docs: returns the documentation of the endpoints for the api

/api/users.description: returns an object with all the available users

/api/topics.description: returns an object with the available topics

topics.description: he seem to be heading to dumptown usa again, maybe he need help in his relationships ???
there is an album out there for you

/api/articles.description: returns an object with all available articles

articles.title: How Rigby is progressively getting lazy
articles.author: high-5

/api/articles/:article_id.description: returns the article with that id

article.title: How Rigby is progressively getting lazy
article.body: Have you recently spotted  Rigby doing any work ? I haven"t. The guy can"t start a single job and finish it. Why is he still hired?? Maybe he would be better in a different park not this one. Either Benson fires him or I will have to talk to Pop"s dad.
article.author: high-5
